    • getPlaylistsWithTheUserFirst

      ArrayList<Playlist> getPlaylistsWithTheUserFirst(String userNameFromFile)
      Order playlists with the user first
      Parameters:
      userNameFromFile - username from file to order the playlists with the user first
      Returns:
      list of playlists with the user first

    • getSongsFromPlaylist

      List<Song> getSongsFromPlaylist(String playlistName)
      Get songs from playlist
      Parameters:
      playlistName - playlist name to get the songs from the playlist
      Returns:
      list of songs from the playlist

    • deletePlaylist

      boolean deletePlaylist(String playlistName, String userNameFromFile)
      Delete playlist
      Parameters:
      playlistName - playlist name to delete the playlist
      userNameFromFile - username from file to delete the playlist
      Returns:
      true if the playlist has been deleted, false if not

    • deleteSongFromPlaylist

      boolean deleteSongFromPlaylist(String playlistName, String title, String userNameFromFile)
      Add song to playlist
      Parameters:
      playlistName - playlist name to add the song to the playlist
      title - song to add to the playlist
      userNameFromFile - username from file to add the song to the playlist
      Returns:
      true if the song has been added to the playlist, false if not
